card.name: Jace, Architect of Thought
card.property: +1: Until your next turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn. −2: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library in any order. −8: For each player, search that player's library for a nonland card and exile it, then that player shuffles their library. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Chronomaton
card.property: {1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Chronomaton.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On the third night, the villagers destroyed their clocks. The sounds of whirring gears and chiming metal held only dread for them.

card.name: Jace's Phantasm
card.property: Flying Jace's Phantasm gets +4/+4 as long as an opponent has ten or more cards in their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the abstract memories of the Iquati, Jace found interesting ideas to improve upon.

card.name: Phantasmal Bear
card.property: When Phantasmal Bear becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know it to be false, but when its claws find you, what you know won't matter much at all." —Pol Jamaar, illusionist

card.name: Aether Figment
card.property: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Aether Figment can't be blocked. If Aether Figment was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Crosstown Courier
card.property: Whenever Crosstown Courier deals combat damage to a player, that player puts that many cards from the top of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Information travels quickly through Ravnica's network of messengers and thought agents.

card.name: Dream Stalker
card.property: When Dream Stalker enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What happens when it is the dream that wakes and the sleeper that fades into memory?

card.name: Krovikan Mist
card.property: Flying Krovikan Mist's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Illusions on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's as strong as you believe it is, and it's very convincing." —Jace Beleren

card.name: Merfolk Wayfinder
card.property: Flying When Merfolk Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all Island cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Sea Gate Oracle
card.property: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Stealer of Secrets
card.property: Whenever Stealer of Secrets deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Dimir would hire her, if only they knew where she lived. The Azorius would condemn her, if only they knew her name.

card.name: Aether Adept
card.property: When Aether Adept enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The universe is my instrument, and the song I play upon it is one you are forbidden to hear."

card.name: Archaeomancer
card.property: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

card.name: Phantasmal Dragon
card.property: Flying When Phantasmal Dragon becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its hunger and ire are no less for being wrought of lies and mist.

card.name: Body Double
card.property: You may have Body Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature card in a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am who I pretend to be."

card.name: Leyline Phantom
card.property: When Leyline Phantom deals combat damage, return it to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it survived combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is the maze itself a phantom? Or is one as real as the other? Perhaps I am as mad as the dragon." —Jace Beleren, journal

card.name: Aeon Chronicler
card.property: Aeon Chronicler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. Suspend X—{X}{3}{U}. X can't be 0. (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {X}{3}{U} and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Aeon Chronicler while it's exiled, draw a card.

card.name: Riftwing Cloudskate
card.property: Flying When Riftwing Cloudskate enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand. Suspend 3—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

card.name: Jace's Mindseeker
card.property: Flying When Jace's Mindseeker enters the battlefield, target opponent puts the top five cards of their library into their graveyard. You may cast an instant or sorcery card from among them without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Errant Ephemeron
card.property: Flying Suspend 4—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

card.name: Thought Scour
card.property: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As you inject the viscus vitae into the brain stem, don't let the spastic moaning bother you. It will soon become music to your ears." —Stitcher Geralf

card.name: Agoraphobia
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -5/-0. {2}{U}: Return Agoraphobia to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everyone in this city is choosing sides. I choose inside."

card.name: Into the Roil
card.property: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Roil tide! Roil tide! Tie yourselves down!"

card.name: Memory Lapse
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To sculpt a mind is to see every memory and thought as an individual piece that can be rearranged—or removed." —Jace Beleren

card.name: Prohibit
card.property: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Counter target spell if its converted mana cost is 2 or less. If this spell was kicked, counter that spell if its converted mana cost is 4 or less instead.

card.name: Remand
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Azorius, the law can be a physical shield against chaos and anarchy.

card.name: Claustrophobia
card.property: Enchant creature When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

card.name: Griptide
card.property: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beware the seagrafs just off the shore. These waters are filled with hungry geists looking for an easy meal." —Captain Eberhart

card.name: Ray of Command
card.property: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

card.name: Control Magic
card.property: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do as I think, not as I do." —Jace Beleren

card.name: Summoner's Bane
card.property: Counter target creature spell. Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't need to have the perfect plan. My foe just has to have an imperfect one." —Jace Beleren

card.name: Jace's Ingenuity
card.property: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Brute force can sometimes kick down a locked door, but knowledge is a skeleton key."

card.name: Future Sight
card.property: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is the inevitable any less miraculous?" —Veldka, wandering sage

card.name: Spelltwine
card.property: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard and target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. Copy those cards. Cast the copies if able without paying their mana costs. Exile Spelltwine.

card.name: Dread Statuary
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {4}: Dread Statuary becomes a 4/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The last reliable landmark in Tazeem just walked away.

card.name: Halimar Depths
card.property: Halimar Depths enters the battlefield tapped. When Halimar Depths enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. {T}: Add {U}.

card.name: Vraska the Unseen
card.property: +1: Until your next turn, whenever a creature deals combat damage to Vraska the Unseen, destroy that creature. −3: Destroy target nonland permanent. −7: Create three 1/1 black Assassin creature tokens with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game."

card.name: Pulse Tracker
card.property: Whenever Pulse Tracker attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can't think your way out of this, Jace. Thought implies life, and life requires a pulse—music to a hunter's ears." —Vraska

card.name: Shadow Alley Denizen
card.property: Whenever another black creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

card.name: Tavern Swindler
card.property: {T}, Pay 3 life: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 6 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos cultists are her best customers. They never flinch at pain and are seldom good at math.

card.name: Wight of Precinct Six
card.property: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the lost and undead need a protector.

card.name: Death-Hood Cobra
Gatecreeper Vine
card.property: Defender When Gatecreeper Vine enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card or a Gate card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every inch of Ravnica is home to something.

card.name: River Boa
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) {G}: Regenerate River Boa.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sheath your swords! Cudgels only. I see a new pair of waterproof trek boots slithering away." —Nablus, North Hada trapper

card.name: Vinelasher Kudzu
card.property: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Vinelasher Kudzu.

card.name: Putrid Leech
card.property: Pay 2 life: Putrid Leech gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Golgari would say that life comes from death and death comes from life. But sometimes, death comes from the dead." —Vraska

card.name: Sadistic Augermage
card.property: When Sadistic Augermage dies, each player puts a card from their hand on top of their library.

card.name: Slate Street Ruffian
card.property: Whenever Slate Street Ruffian becomes blocked, defending player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Merciless to the point of psychosis. Let's give him a job." —Zelinas, Orzhov recruiter

card.name: Oran-Rief Recluse
card.property: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) When Oran-Rief Recluse enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target creature with flying.

card.name: Spawnwrithe
card.property: Trample Whenever Spawnwrithe deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of Spawnwrithe.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its victims feel only an itchy, wriggling feeling just under their skin. By then, it's far too late.

card.name: Stonefare Crocodile
card.property: {2} {B}: Stonefare Crocodile gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet's plans to exploit the undercity ran into a few stubborn obstacles.

card.name: Ohran Viper
card.property: Whenever Ohran Viper deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat. Whenever Ohran Viper deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ohran viper is not cold-blooded. Its veins course with the same antigelid venom used to kill its prey.

card.name: Corpse Traders
card.property: {2} {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Festerhide Boar
card.property: Trample Morbid — Festerhide Boar enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bury your dead deep. The boars are hungriest while the corpse is still warm." —Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

card.name: Mold Shambler
card.property: Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Mold Shambler enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target noncreature permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When civilization encroaches on nature, Zendikar encroaches back.

card.name: Highway Robber
card.property: When Highway Robber enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tonight, madam, it's your money and your life."

card.name: Nekrataal
card.property: First strike When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

card.name: Reaper of the Wilds
card.property: Whenever another creature dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {B}: Reaper of the Wilds gains deathtouch until end of turn. {1}{G}: Reaper of the Wilds gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Acidic Slime
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Drooling Groodion

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Golgari expand, yes, but I refuse to call their tainted creations 'growth.'" —Niszka, Selesnya evangel

card.name: Tragic Slip
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Morbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Linger on death's door and risk being invited in.

card.name: Hypnotic Cloud
card.property: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Target player discards a card. If this spell was kicked, that player discards three cards instead.

card.name: Night's Whisper
card.property: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen things that would reduce a weaker person to blubbering and raving. Want to hear about them?" —Vraska

card.name: Marsh Casualties
card.property: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Creatures target player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, those creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Treasured Find
card.property: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Treasured Find.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gorgons crave beautiful things: gems, exquisite amulets, the alabaster corpses of the petrified dead . . .

card.name: Last Kiss
card.property: Last Kiss deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Romanticize it, glamorize it, call it what you will. To me, it will always be carnal, bloody murder." —Ayli, Kamsa cleric

card.name: Stab Wound
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Underworld Connections
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you're looking for it, it's available. The question is how much you're willing to pay.

card.name: Consume Strength
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are correct. This is going to hurt." —Vraska

card.name: Grisly Spectacle
card.property: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch people flock to a murder scene. Then tell me we're not all a little sick in the head." —Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

card.name: Golgari Guildgate
card.property: Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter those who are starving and sick. You are welcome among the Swarm when the rest of Ravnica rejects you.

card.name: Rogue's Passage
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.

card.name: Tainted Wood
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.
